title: Exquisite Emerald & Diamond Floral Haaram - Har00140
materials: Crafted in 14.06 grams of pure gold. Embellished with 7.98 carats of sparkling diamonds and 1.24 carats of vibrant rubies
expertly cut and set. Features a high-polish finish
features: This breathtaking Haaram features a multi-strand design adorned with floral motifs. The elaborate central pendant showcases intricate filigree work. Delicate crescent-shaped drops featuring emeralds further enhance the beauty. The design reflects traditional Telugu aesthetics with a modern touch.
colors: Predominantly gold with the brilliant sparkle of diamonds and the rich green of emeralds and small rubies. The contrasting colors create a visually stunning effect.
occasions: and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham (సీమంతం). This timeless piece also makes a statement at upscale parties and special events.
description: This Haaram is a true masterpiece, blending traditional South Indian design with modern elegance. The meticulous craftsmanship ensures durability and longevity, making it a cherished heirloom. The use of high-quality diamonds and emeralds guarantees exceptional brilliance and value.
